name: Holoquest
description:
When a strange dragon attacks the happy-go-lucky Holotown, the HoloMyth idols rush to the aid of their friends! Who is the mysterious dragon, and what is it after? Explore and battle your way through three dungeons, sneak up on enemies, encounter special bosses, and more!

Holoquest is a comical JRPG featuring the girls of HoloMyth: Mori Calliope, Takanashi Kiara, Watson Amelia, Ninomae Ina'nis, and Gawr Gura. Familiarity with Hololive and its characters is not required to play and complete the game. 

Estimated game time is about three to four hours.

Mac version on the way!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CONTROLS

Z- Accept/OK
X - Cancel/Menu
Arrow Keys - Move
Shift - Dash

Controls can be reconfigured in the Options menu.

NOTE!

On the macOS version, you may get a message that says "'Game' cannot be opened because the developer cannot be verified." In order to circumvent this, do the following:

1. Move the game to Applications.
2. Go to Settings > Security and Privacy.
3. Unlock the padlock.
4. Select the "Open Anyway" option.
5. Click "Open" from the following prompt.
